attributes.action: Allow and commission British Farmers to grow Hemp crops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hemp is an invaluable source of fuel oil, clothing and food which was only outlawed with the 20th century due to it's cannabis-strain related overtones.

Hemp seeds are high in protein and minerals. They are a source of food and general trade which have been denied to the British nation for too long.

The use of Hemp products would reduce the amount of fossil-oil based products as the properties are similar.

The cultivation of Hemp for industry usage would greatly reduce the 'Carbon Footprints' of the current population.

Hemp is also a source of natural and medicinal therapeutic utilisation, constricted due to the 'immoral' nature of the plant.

The UK would thrive immensely from this MegaCrop.
